subject: Re: Regexp
body:
Somu schreef:
> why wont the following work?
> 
>  $q = shift;

   print length($q), "\n";

>  $p = "pass";
>  if ( $q =~ m/$p/i ) { print 'match' }
> 
>  But it works on changing the $q and $p places..


-- 
Affijn, Ruud

"Gewoon is een tijger."
